channel.title: Sessions :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: If HTTP is stateless, how do e-commerce websites manage to keep track of the contents of your shopping cart as you navigate from page to page? The answer is the use of a session - a technique by which state is added to a web application. Info The term session appears a lot in web development, and can mean different things in different contexts. But there is a common thread in each - a session is a form of connection between the client and server.
